product_description: Take a sunny-day stroll in these cuffed cargo shorts styled in a tie-dyed camo print.
product_details_and_care:
Take a sunny-day stroll in these cuffed cargo shorts styled in a tie-dyed camo print.
10" inseam; 7" leg opening; 10" front rise

Side pockets; back button-flap pockets
97% cotton, 3% spandex
Machine wash, tumble dry
